channel.title: CVE Feed for Mattermost -- Mattermost Desktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mattermost -- Mattermost Desktop

item.title: CVE-2023-5875|2024-08-02T08:14:24.611Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20desktop
item.description: Mattermost Desktop fails to correctlyÂ handle permissions or prompt the user for consent on certain sensitive ones allowing media exploitation from a malicious mattermost server

item.title: CVE-2023-5920|2024-08-02T08:14:24.994Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20desktop
item.description: Mattermost Desktop for MacOS fails to utilize the secure keyboard input functionality provided by macOS, allowing for other processes to read the keyboard input.

item.title: CVE-2023-5876|2024-08-02T08:14:24.301Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20desktop
item.description: Mattermost fails to properly validate a RegExp built off the server URL path, allowing an attacker in control of an enrolled server to mount a Denial Of Service.
